narrativeSummary: The simulation indicates a significant strain on your finances. Your emergency fund would be depleted by month 4, and you would enter a negative cash flow situation. Your 'Condo Down Payment' goal would be delayed by an estimated 14 months.

recommendations.title: Aggressively Cut Discretionary Spending
recommendations.description: Immediately reduce your 'Dining' and 'Shopping' budgets by 75% to extend your financial runway. This is the most critical first step.

recommendations.title: Explore Freelance Platforms
recommendations.description: Proactively seek smaller, supplemental income streams on platforms like Upwork or Fiverr to partially offset the income drop.

recommendations.title: Contact Lenders Proactively
recommendations.description: If the situation becomes critical, contact your lenders about potential forbearance or temporary payment reduction programs before you miss a payment.
